author: Alex Brown
text:
The attached public notice was issued by the FCC seeking comment on concerns and issues related to the disruption of wireless service by government authorities for the purpose of public safety. The Commission is requesting that comments on different aspects of this issue including past precedent, bases for interrupting service, risks of interrupting service and scope, authority, and legal basis of interruption.
If you believe that you have experience or expertise in this issue I encourage you to submit comments on behalf of your local government. If you would like ICMA to help coordinate your response please contact me at alexbrown@icma.org. Comments must be submitted by April 30, 2012.
title: FCC Public Notice on Wireless Service Interruptions
